channel.title: Jumpcut Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 0.63
item.description: When using Spaces, bezel window now appears in active Space rather than reverting to the first Space it was used in; revised tooltips in preferences window

item.title: Version 0.62
item.description: Paste support for Dvorak and international keyboard users; new wraparound option in bezel interface; updated ShortcutRecorder and Sparkle libraries.

item.title: Version 0.61
item.description: Added "launch on login" preference; moved to current versions of ShortcutRecorder and Sparkle auto-updater code.

item.title: Version 0.6
item.description: Improved preference panel; improved "remember" and "display" preferences; added Appearance preference pane; added "sticky bezel" option; now using ShortcutRecorder for improved hotkey selection; rewrote back-end bezel code; now using Sparkle automatic-update framework; added preference for menu items to paste directly rather than simply inserting themselves into the pasteboard.
